price: (72) And [they are] those who do not testify to falsehood, and when they pass near ill speech, they pass by with dignity.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ ٱلزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِٱللَّغۡوِ مَرُّواْ كِرَامٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna lā yashhadūna al-zūra wa-idhā marrū bil-laghwi marrū kirāman
